name: Modern Queen Bed Frame
description: Experience luxurious comfort and sturdy craftsmanship with our Modern Queen Bed Frame. Built from kiln-dried hardwood with a rich matte walnut finish, this bed is both elegant and durable. The slatted base supports your mattress without the need for a box spring, while the soft headboard adds comfort and warmth to any bedroom. Perfect for minimalist or mid-century interiors.

name: Soft Sofa Chair
description: Designed with both form and function in mind, the Ergonomic Lounge Chair supports your posture while delivering premium relaxation. Crafted from molded ash wood and soft foam cushioning, it fits naturally into modern living rooms, home offices, or reading corners. A perfect blend of comfort and sophistication.

name: 3-Drawer Dresser
description: Add function and simplicity to your bedroom or hallway with this 6-drawer Scandinavian dresser. Featuring soft-close drawers, natural ash wood grain, and tapered legs, it provides ample storage while enhancing your interior aesthetics. Built to last and designed to impress.

name: Contemporary 3-Seater Sofa
description: The Contemporary 3-Seater Sofa blends classic comfort with clean lines. Upholstered in durable woven fabric with deep seat cushions and a solid wood frame, itâ€™s made for lounging, entertaining, and relaxing. Available in a range of earthy tones to match your living space style.
